effect.description: Either kill another charcter in the same location as the culprit, or place an Intrigue on the culprit’s location.
The leader chooses one character. That charcter is killed.
Attach a Curse on the culprit.
For each other character in cluprit’s location, pick any other location and move the character there.

effect.prerequisite: 6 or more zombies when this incident occurs.
effect.description: The Protagonists will die after the day has ended.
Place a curse on the culprit’s location.
Place 2 Paranoia on any one character, and an Intrigue on any location.
Kill all characters in the culprits location.

effect.prerequisite: After that, if that location has 5 or more corpses

effect.description: Kill any one character (including culprit) in the same location as the culprit.
All characters in the culprit’s location are killed.
All characters and the Protagonists are killed.
When determinig whether this incident occours or not, count Intrigde instead of Paranoia. For the rest of the loop, if another Incident occours, the Protagonists are killed after the Incident step.
